title: Does the organization offers goods and services via the Internet?

answers.text: My organization provides goods and services through the internet
My organization does not carry out any internet related activity

title: Are there citizens of EU among organization's clients?
info: Citizenship of the European Union (EU) is afforded to qualifying citizens of European Union member states. List of member states can be found in the references section on the right

answers.text: Yes, my organization operates on personal data of EU citizens
No, my organization does not possess any personal data of EU citizens

title: Does your organization performs any of the following actions with the data: collection, recording, organisation, structuring, storage, adaptation or alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure by transmission, dissemination or otherwise making available, alignment or combination, restriction, erasure or destruction
info: If anything of the above is applicable to your organization, it requires personal data processing in order to carry out its business

answers.text: My rganization requires processing of personal data in order to carry out its business
My organization does not carry out personal data processing
I am not sure about the answer

title: Does your organization decides on aims and means of PD processing?
info: Your organization possesses the data and decides on what to do with it in order to fulfill own interest

answers.text: Yes, my organization takes a complete responsibility for the personal data provided
No, my organization does processing on behalf of another organization and has to address its interests
I am not sure about the answer

title: Do individuals give a consent for processing their personal data? Do you provide them with a Consent Clause Form?
info: If your organization collects personal data on the web-site there should be a pop-up window with consent request

answers.text: Individuals give an explicit consent to the processing of their personal data for purposes of my organization
Individuals are not asked a permission to process their personal data
My organization has another basis for personal data processing

references.title: Consent, forms & GDPR Best Practice Guide

title: Consent must be unambiguous. This means customers need to easily understand what they are signing up for. Is there any doubt in your statements?

validExample.title: Examples of valid consent:
list: I would like to receive emails from [Brand name]
Sign me up for email communications
I understand and agree to the email marketing terms & conditions

info: For information, please, visit the references from reference section

answers.text: Statements on the consent form of my organization are clear, precise and similar to ones from the valid example
Statements on the consent form of my organization are more similar to the ones on the invalid example
I am not sure about the answer

references.title: Consent, forms & GDPR Best Practice Guide
